community-creators.page-description: Do you create GeoGuessr content on Youtube, TikTok, Twitch, Fan site or any other platform? If so you may qualify to join the GeoGuessr Content Creator program!
community-creators.creator-badge-usp: Get a unique Creator Only Badge
community-creators.discord-usp: A direct line of contact with the GeoGuessr devs
community-creators.following-usp: Get your content featured on the community page and grow your following
community-creators.money-usp: Earn money when your followers purchase avatar assets or coins with Creator Codes
community-creators.content-requirement: One GeoGuessr related post/video per week
community-creators.connection-code-title: Welcome to the GeoGuessr Creator Program, {0}!
community-creators.connection-code-subti: You are now a verified GeoGuessr Creator. You now have access to all the assets in the avatar wardrobe and the official Creator badge will now appear next to your username. You will earn money whenever your followers purchase avatar assets or coins with your Creator code activated in the shop.
Thank you for being a part of this awesome community, happy exploring! Hopefully we'll be in touch!
community-creators.you-are-now-a-verifie: You are now a verified GeoGuessr creator.
community-creators.creator-connection-li: You have access to all the assets in the avatar wardrobe
The official creator badge will appear next to your username
You'll earn money whenever your followers purchase with your code activated in the shop
community-creators.thank-you-for-being-a: Thank you for being a part of this awesome community!
community-creators.happy-exploring-be-in: Happy exploring & hopefully we'll be in touch!
community-creators.this-account-already-: This account is already a verified creator!
